intro: Meyenia longiflora, commonly known as the long-flowered meyenia, is a herbaceous perennial native to the Mediterranean region. It features slender, upright stems that bear clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. The plant has narrow, lance-shaped leaves that are arranged alternately along the stem. Meyenia longiflora thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it suitable for rock gardens and borders. Its botanical characteristics make it a valuable addition to ecological and ornamental landscapes.
